law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 192, effective July 15, 1998 -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 358, sec. 25, effective July 1, 1997. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 489, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Circumstances permitting court to order further detention of child in custody of Department of Juvenile Justice or cabinet.
